tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: You can find the Tenant ID in the Azure Portal. After signing in, click on 'Azure Active Directory' in the left-hand menu. The Tenant ID can be found in the 'Tenant information' section on the 'Azure Active Directory' overview page.

site_name.title: Site Name
site_name.description: You can find the site name in the url address when you visit your SharePoint or OneDrive for Business.

folder.title: Folder (optional)
folder.description: Folder to search and download the files from.

last_updated_at.title: Last Updated At (optional)
last_updated_at.description: Date from which data is downloaded. Either date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. You can also set this as last run, which will fetch data from the last run of the component.

custom_tag.title: Custom Tag (optional)
custom_tag.description: Adds custom tag to Keboola Storage for all downloaded files.
